Sample.Title: Read-Only
Sample.Description: The example showcases the PDF viewer functioning in a read-only mode. It is designed to prevent editing of annotations and form fields, as well as to disable text selection capabilities.

Sample.Title: Invisible Signatures
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to digitally sign a PDF document from code behind using Syncfusion's PDF Viewer and PDF Library.

Sample.Title: Form Field Customization
Sample.Description: The sample demonstrates how two different users can sequentially fill out their designated fields. Fields are color-coded (red for tenant, green for landlord), with tenant information required before landlord fields become visible and save functionality enabled only after both users complete their required information.

Sample.Title: Smart Form Filling
Sample.SearchTags: pdf, pdf viewer, smart fill, form, form filling
Sample.Description: This sample illustrates how the Syncfusion .NET MAUI PDF Viewer, with the help of AI, can automatically fill form fields using the content copied by the user.
